Arrangement.text:
VERSE 1: Son of G[Dmaj7]od You save[Gmaj7]d me Rescued [Dmaj7]me out of [Gmaj7]darkness Caused these [Dmaj7]blinded eye[Gmaj7]s to see Just how [D]beau[A]tif[G2]ul You are
CHORUS 1: Jesus, You [Gmaj7]are bea[G6]utif[D2/F#]ul Jesus, You [Gmaj7]are bea[G]utif[F#m7]ul Because You f[Gmaj7]irst loved me, I l[D2/F#]ove You [G2]Jesu[G6]s, [Asus4]You are beautif[Dmaj7]ul [G/D] [Dmaj7] [G/D]
VERSE 2: Jesus [Dmaj7]Christ, my S[Gmaj7]avior Your great [Dmaj7]love knows no [Gmaj7]measure Though I [Dmaj7]sin conti[Gmaj7]nually Lord, Your [D]kind[A]ness [G2]follows me
CHORUS 2: Jesus, You [Gmaj7]are bea[G6]utif[D2/F#]ul Jesus, You [Gmaj7]are bea[G]utif[F#m7]ul Because You f[G]irst loved me, I l[D2/F#]ove You Because You f[G/B]irst loved me, I l[D2/F#]ove You Because You f[G]irst loved me, I l[D2/F#]ove You
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 son of god you saved me rescued me out of darkness caused these blinded eyes to see just how beautiful you are chorus 1 jesus you are beautiful jesus you are beautiful because you first loved me i love you jesus you are beautiful verse 2 jesus christ my savior your great love knows no measure though i sin continually lord your kindness follows me chorus 2 jesus you are beautiful jesus you are beautiful because you first loved me i love you because you first loved me i love you because you first loved me i love you
